description: Returns a quote and exchange information for exchanging one or more specified Convertible Reserved Instances for a new Convertible Reserved Instance. If the exchange cannot be performed, the reason is returned in the response. Use  AcceptReservedInstancesExchangeQuote to perform the exchange.

parameters.name: ReservedInstanceIds
parameters.description: The IDs of the Convertible Reserved Instances to exchange. (string) ---

parameters.name: TargetConfigurations
parameters.description: The configuration of the target Convertible Reserved Instance to exchange for your current Convertible Reserved Instances. (dict) --- Details about the target configuration. InstanceCount (integer) --- The number of instances the Convertible Reserved Instance offering can be applied to. This parameter is reserved and cannot be specified in a request The Convertible Reserved Instance offering ID.

nested_params.name: InstanceCount
nested_params.description: The number of instances the Convertible Reserved Instance offering can be applied to. This parameter is reserved and cannot be specified in a request.

nested_params.name: OfferingId
nested_params.description: The Convertible Reserved Instance offering ID.

nested_items.name: CurrencyCode
nested_items.description: The currency of the transaction.

nested_items.name: IsValidExchange
nested_items.description: If true, the exchange is valid. If false, the exchange cannot be completed.

nested_items.name: OutputReservedInstancesWillExpireAt
nested_items.description: The new end date of the reservation term.

nested_items.name: PaymentDue
nested_items.description: The total true upfront charge for the exchange.

nested_items.name: ReservedInstanceValueRollup
nested_items.description: The cost associated with the Reserved Instance.

nested_items.name: HourlyPrice
nested_items.description: The hourly rate of the reservation.

nested_items.name: RemainingTotalValue
nested_items.description: The balance of the total value (the sum of remainingUpfrontValue + hourlyPrice * number of hours remaining).

nested_items.name: RemainingUpfrontValue
nested_items.description: The remaining upfront cost of the reservation.

nested_items.name: ReservedInstanceValueSet
nested_items.description: The configuration of your Convertible Reserved Instances.

nested_items.name: ReservationValue
nested_items.description: The total value of the Convertible Reserved Instance that you are exchanging.

nested_items.name: HourlyPrice
nested_items.description: The hourly rate of the reservation.

nested_items.name: RemainingTotalValue
nested_items.description: The balance of the total value (the sum of remainingUpfrontValue + hourlyPrice * number of hours remaining).

nested_items.name: RemainingUpfrontValue
nested_items.description: The remaining upfront cost of the reservation.

nested_items.name: ReservedInstanceId
nested_items.description: The ID of the Convertible Reserved Instance that you are exchanging.

nested_items.name: TargetConfigurationValueRollup
nested_items.description: The cost associated with the Reserved Instance.

nested_items.name: HourlyPrice
nested_items.description: The hourly rate of the reservation.

nested_items.name: RemainingTotalValue
nested_items.description: The balance of the total value (the sum of remainingUpfrontValue + hourlyPrice * number of hours remaining).

nested_items.name: RemainingUpfrontValue
nested_items.description: The remaining upfront cost of the reservation.

nested_items.name: TargetConfigurationValueSet
nested_items.description: The values of the target Convertible Reserved Instances.

nested_items.name: ReservationValue
nested_items.description: The total value of the Convertible Reserved Instances that make up the exchange. This is the sum of the list value, remaining upfront price, and additional upfront cost of the exchange.

nested_items.name: HourlyPrice
nested_items.description: The hourly rate of the reservation.

nested_items.name: RemainingTotalValue
nested_items.description: The balance of the total value (the sum of remainingUpfrontValue + hourlyPrice * number of hours remaining).

nested_items.name: RemainingUpfrontValue
nested_items.description: The remaining upfront cost of the reservation.

nested_items.name: TargetConfiguration
nested_items.description: The configuration of the Convertible Reserved Instances that make up the exchange.

nested_items.name: InstanceCount
nested_items.description: The number of instances the Convertible Reserved Instance offering can be applied to. This parameter is reserved and cannot be specified in a request.

nested_items.name: OfferingId
nested_items.description: The ID of the Convertible Reserved Instance offering.

nested_items.name: ValidationFailureReason
nested_items.description: Describes the reason why the exchange cannot be completed.
